An emotional return to Parken Stadium after Saturday's eventsIt’s set to be an emotional return to Parken Stadium for a Denmark team thankful for Christian Eriksen’s improving health but still traumatised by what they witnessed on Saturday. Romelu Lukaku paid tribute to his Inter teammate while tearing Russia apart at the weekend and this could be a strange affair, with Belgium expected to inflict another defeat on the Danes.
